Open 'https://example.com/products/item1'

Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, has text 'Add to Cart', font size 16px, font weight 700, background color #4CAF50, text color #FFFFFF, padding 12px 24px, border radius 4px, width 180px, height 48px, and aria-label 'Add selected item to shopping cart'
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button hover background color changes to #45A049 with 200ms transition
Open 'https://example.com/login'

Verify the 'Username' input field is enabled, has placeholder 'Enter your username', font family 'Arial', font size 14px, border 1px solid #CCCCCC, padding 10px, margin bottom 15px, and its value is empty
Click the 'Username' input field
Verify the 'Username' input field gains focus with border color #007BFF and 150ms transition
Verify the 'Username' input field's label displays 'Username'
Open 'https://example.com/'

Verify the 'About Us' navigation link is visible, has text 'About Us', color #333333, font size 15px, font weight 500, top position 20px, left position 300px, width 80px, height 25px, and aria-label 'Navigate to About Us page'
Verify the 'About Us' navigation link on selection changes text color to #007BFF and background color to transparent with 300ms transition
Open 'https://example.com/gallery'

Verify the main gallery image 'image_01.jpg' is loaded, has source 'images/image_01.jpg', natural dimensions 1920x1080px, rendered dimensions 800x600px, alt text 'Scenic Mountain View', load time under 500ms, 2px solid #DDDDDD border, border radius 8px, and a 'Premium' watermark visible at bottom-right
Open 'https://example.com/video/lecture'
Verify the video player is visible, width 960px, height 540px, and initially muted
Verify the play button has background color #FF0000, font size 24px, and aria-label 'Play video'
Click the play button
Verify video player sets muted to false and play button background color changes to #00FF00 after 100ms transition
Verify the fullscreen button is enabled
Open 'https://example.com/data_table'
Verify the first table row (index 0) is visible, height 40px, background color #F9F9F9, and contains 5 cells
Verify the 'Status' cell has text 'Active', color #008000, font weight 600, and is left-aligned
Verify on first table row selection, background color changes to #E0F7FA and border bottom 1px solid #00BCD4
Open 'https://example.com/dashboard'
Trigger a modal dialog
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered horizontally (left and right margins equal), width 500px, height 300px, has background color #FFFFFF, border radius 8px, and opacity 1.0
Verify the 'Close' button has font size 14px, color #666666, and aria-label 'Close dialog'
Open 'https://example.com/home'

Verify the search input field is visible, enabled, has placeholder 'Search products...', font family 'Roboto', font size 16px, padding 8px 12px, border 1px solid #CED4DA, border radius 20px, and its value is empty
Type 'laptop' into the search input field
Verify the search input field value changes to 'laptop'
Open 'https://example.com/products?page=1'
Verify the pagination component is visible, centrally aligned at the bottom of the content area (y position > 500px)
Verify 5 page number buttons are displayed, each 32px wide, 32px high, with font size 14px, and border radius 4px
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled and has aria-label 'Go to next page'
Open 'https://example.com/settings'
Perform an action to trigger a success notification

Verify a success notification appears visible at top-right (x > 800px, y < 50px), has text 'Settings saved successfully!', background color #D4EDDA, text color #155724, padding 15px, border radius 5px, width 300px, opacity 1.0, and an animation to fade out over 2s after 5s
Open 'https://example.com/account'
Click the 'Options' button
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible below the button, has width 150px, background color #FFFFFF, border 1px solid #DDDDDD, border radius 4px, and contains exactly 3 list items
Verify the first dropdown item 'Edit Profile' has font size 14px, color #333333, and aria-label 'Edit user profile settings'
Verify the 'Email Notifications' checkbox is visible, enabled, initially not selected, and its x coordinate is 50px
Verify the 'Email Notifications' checkbox label displays 'Email Notifications' with font size 16px and color #333333
Click the 'Email Notifications' checkbox
Verify the 'Email Notifications' checkbox becomes selected, its value changes to true, has 1px solid #007BFF border, and background color #E0F7FA with 100ms transition
Open 'https://example.com/contact'

Verify the 'Message' text area is visible, enabled, has placeholder 'Type your message here...', font family 'Verdana', font size 14px, width 400px, height 120px, border 1px solid #CED4DA, padding 10px, and its value is empty
Verify the 'Message' text area on focus border color changes to #007BFF
Verify the 'Message' text area's label displays 'Your Message'
Open 'https://example.com/upload'
Initiate a file upload
Verify the progress bar element is visible, has background color #E9ECEF, width 500px, height 20px, and border radius 10px
Verify the inner progress indicator is initially 0% width, color #007BFF, animates smoothly to 75% width over 500ms as data is uploaded, and has aria-label 'File upload progress'
Open 'https://example.com/booking'
Open a date picker
Verify the date picker dialog is visible, background color #FFFFFF, width 300px, height 350px, border 1px solid #CCCCCC, and top position 100px
Verify the current month header displays text 'July 2024' with font size 18px and font weight 600
Verify today's date (July 15, 2024) is highlighted with background color #007BFF and color #FFFFFF
Open 'https://example.com/analytics'
Verify the sales chart canvas is visible, width 800px, height 400px, and displays data for the last 7 days
Verify the x-axis labels have font size 12px, color #666666, and are aligned bottom
Verify the chart's legend items have padding 5px and margin right 10px
Verify the 'Revenue' legend item is active with background color #E6F7F3
Open 'https://example.com/profile'

Verify the 'Account Settings' tab is visible, active, has text 'Account Settings', background color #007BFF, text color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, padding 10px 15px, border bottom 3px solid #0056B3, right position 500px, and aria-label 'Access account settings'
Open 'https://example.com/'
Scroll to the bottom of the page
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' footer link is visible, has text 'Privacy Policy', color #6C757D, font size 13px, font weight 400, located at y coordinate > 900px, and its value is 'privacy'
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' footer link on hover changes color to #007BFF with 150ms transition and has 1px solid #6C757D border bottom
Open 'https://example.com/anypage'

Verify the main header logo image is visible, loaded, has source 'images/logo.png', natural dimensions 200x50px, rendered dimensions 180x45px, alt text 'Company Logo', left position 20px, top position 10px, border radius 5px, and load time under 150ms
Open 'https://example.com/profile'

Verify the user profile avatar image is visible, loaded, has source 'avatars/user_123.jpg', natural dimensions 100x100px, rendered dimensions 80x80px, alt text 'User Profile Picture', circular shape (border radius 50%), 2px solid #007BFF border, right position 50px, top position 60px, and load time under 200ms
